name: Fantasy Stylist
description:
Beth graduated from a prestigious university, but working as a waitress. . . She is good friends with the boy she has a crush on, but she cannot be a lover. . .

Beth are in desperate need of a makeover! She need some change for a new job, and become more confident or try something new. Whatever it is, help her turning her lives around! Choose from fashionable clothes, gorgeous hairstyles, eye-catching makeup! MAKEOVER helpless Beth and give her the confidence to follow their dreams!

SOLVE addictive puzzles with challenging obstacles! Matching puzzles! Solve match-3 puzzles to a makeover fashion style in this fun match-3 adventure! interact with in-game characters & reveal the dramatic romance stories.


Makeover to help Beth reach her goals and follow her dreams!

Help Beth to Makeover now! Are you ready to navigate this challenging match-3 puzzle? We sincerely hope that you like our new match-3 puzzle game! CHOOSE from a variety of fashionable clothes and outfits to create a new look!
